name: Lolo_Essumon
content:
Lolo Essumon was a male Bothan, who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.
Essumon lived on the space station Burnout, and the Wookiee Kuce worked for him as a bodyguard. During the time of the Clone Wars, the Heroes of Cularin began searching the station for the Trandoshan Xirossk, and Essumon and Kuce confronted them, to find out what the heroes were up to.
